link_desc:
Monitoring of auto-discovered IPMI drive slot sensors (sensor type code 0Dh).

An external script is used for low-level discovery of the sensors (as Zabbix currently lacks LLD of IPMI sensors).

Refer to the README for a list of features, supported items, triggers, graphs, macros and installation instructions.

You might also be interested in the following templates, which are all based on the IPMI Sensor low-level Discovery Script (refer to IPMI Supermicro SSG-6048R-E1CR24N monitoring for an example stack-template which uses them):

  • IPMI Drive Slot Sensors monitoring
  • IPMI Power Supply Sensors monitoring
  • IPMI Power Supply Generic Sensors monitoring
  • IPMI Threshold Sensors Monitoring
  • IPMI Module Board Generic Sensors monitoring
author: Christian Affolter
